contexts.context: ...over weight- but expected this anyway.About 3/4 <mark>hour's</mark> flight among the clouds. A bit bumpy....
...the car and went to Bruges, about and <mark>hour</mark> and a half away. A divine old town...
...etc. It was close in about half an <mark>hour</mark> so didn't have too much time.After this we...
...by rail from Paris in about two and half <mark>hours</mark>. Of course we meet you at the station...
